product_name: Keen Rockbrook CNX Water Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Let your young adventurer explore tide pools and sandy shores in the Keen Rockbrook CNX Water Shoes. With flexible soles and mesh panels for easy draining, they'll keep little feet covered and comfy. Synthetic fabric uppers with side mesh panels are soft and flexible, and allow water to drain when you're back on dry land. Slip-on style with heel and tongue loops provide easy on/off. Durable rubber outsoles on the Keen Rockbrook CNX Water Shoes deliver reliable traction on wet or uneven terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Let your young adventurer explore tide pools and sandy shores in the Keen Rockbrook CNX Water Shoes. With flexible soles and mesh panels for easy draining, they'll keep little feet covered and comfy.
